Next Step in Your Health Journey: Online Health Awareness Course
Dear Health Seeker,

After familiarizing yourself with the foundational concepts of health and wellbeing through the FAQs, Philosophy, and Personal Consultation sections on sevenpointfour.in, it’s now time to delve deeper into the subject.

To support your understanding, I have thoughtfully designed an Online Health Awareness Course. This course consists of 9 essential videos, each carefully selected to offer clarity and insight into the principles we follow.
ðŸ‘‰ What you need to do:
<ul data-start="749" data-end="868">
<li data-start="749" data-end="782">
Watch all 9 videos attentively.
<li data-start="783" data-end="868">
Note down any questions, doubts, or reflections that arise during your viewing.
Once you’ve completed the videos, we will connect via Zoom or WhatsApp for a one-on-one discussion, where I will address your queries and share my perspective.
This step is crucial in giving you a thorough insight into our approach. Based on this understanding, you will be in a better position to decide whether you wish to proceed further.
If you choose to go ahead, you will be expected to follow the process outlined on the Personal Consultation page of the website.
I look forward to supporting you on this transformative journey toward health and clarity.

Warm regards,
Madhav Joshi
